text: Sredi etikh mnogobozhnikov yest' takiye, kotoryye uveruyut v Koran, osoznav yego mysli i suzhdeniya, i takiye, kotoryye ne uveruyut, uporno priderzhivayas' svoyego zabluzhdeniya. Allakh - slava Yemu Vsevyshnemu! - luchshe znayet etikh nechestivykh, otvergayushchikh Koran, i muchitel'no nakazhet ikh za ikh deyaniya
